entry.title: Former FBI profiler reacts to new body cam video of Petito describing dispute with fiancé

media:group.media:title: Former FBI profiler reacts to new body cam video of Petito describing dispute with fiancé
media:group.media:description:
Retired FBI profiler Jim Clemente discusses new body cam video of Gabby Petito describing the dispute she had with her fiancé Brian Laundrie before her disappearance.
#CNN #News

entry.title: What cult expert thinks about the anti-vaccine movement

media:group.media:title: What cult expert thinks about the anti-vaccine movement
media:group.media:description: Steven Hassan, a licensed mental health professional and one of the leading experts on cults, compares how the tactics used by cults to attract followers overlap with the anti-vax moment. Hassan is a former member of the Moonie cult and left the group 45 years ago. #NewDay #BorisSanchez #CNN

entry.title: Smerconish: Sinema and Manchin deserve our praise, not our criticism

media:group.media:title: Smerconish: Sinema and Manchin deserve our praise, not our criticism
media:group.media:description: CNN's Michael Smerconish says that Sen. Joe Manchin's (D-WV) and Kyrsten Sinema's (D-AZ) refusals to simply fall in line and instead exhibit some independence, is both a rarity in Washington - and reflection of their diverse constituencies. #Smerconish #CNN #News

entry.title: From Gabby Petito to 50 Cent's 'BMF,' true crime always fascinates

media:group.media:title: From Gabby Petito to 50 Cent's 'BMF,' true crime always fascinates
media:group.media:description:
The tragic case of Gabby Petito has the internet obsessed. And some are saying it’s not a matter of if, but when Hollywood will pick up the true crime story. From Truman Capote’s “In Cold Blood,” to the OJ Simpson trial to the Murdaugh family murders, we’ve long been voyeurs of real life because it’s stranger than fiction, CNN entertainment reporter Lisa Respers France says. In this week’s episode of “Pop Off,” she talks to the cast of Starz’s “BMF” series, which is based on the real-life crime syndicate, the Black Mafia Family. 50 Cent is the executive producer of the show, and it stars rapper Lil Meech, son of Demetrius “Big Meech” Flenory.
Watch “Pop Off" with Lisa for a sassy, no-nonsense take on entertainment and real life's biggest issues every Saturday morning on CNN’s YouTube channel.

entry.title: Sarah Everard murder shines light on global violence against women

media:group.media:title: Sarah Everard murder shines light on global violence against women
media:group.media:description: CNN’s Bianna Golodryga discusses global violence against women in the wake of the Sarah Everard rape and murder and the need to refocus prevention efforts. #CNN #News

entry.title: California to mandate Covid-19 vaccine for students

media:group.media:title: California to mandate Covid-19 vaccine for students
media:group.media:description:
California will add the Covid-19 vaccination to the immunizations required for in-person school attendance, Gov. Gavin Newsom announced.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Pelosi fails to unite Democratic moderates and progressives

media:group.media:title: Pelosi fails to unite Democratic moderates and progressives
media:group.media:description:
House Speaker Nancy Pelosi ruled against putting a $1 trillion infrastructure bill on the floor Thursday night, according to a leadership aide, after progressives rebelled, potentially delaying consideration until Democrats strike an agreement on separate, much larger social safety net and climate legislation. CNN's Christine Romans and Laura Jarrett report.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Dr. Gupta asks nurse if anything would convince her to get vaccine. Hear her reply

media:group.media:title: Dr. Gupta asks nurse if anything would convince her to get vaccine. Hear her reply
media:group.media:description: CNN's Dr. Sanjay Gupta talks with nurse Andrea Babinski, who has not been vaccinated for Covid-19 despite a mandate from her employer and the possibility she may lose her job for refusing to get the shot. #CNN #News

entry.title: CNN to 'Europe's last dictator': Do you want to apologize?

media:group.media:title: CNN to 'Europe's last dictator': Do you want to apologize?
media:group.media:description:
Belarusian President Alexander Lukashenko, often called Europe's last dictator, has refused to apologize for the widespread human rights violations in the country since his disputed re-election last year in an exclusive interview with CNN's Matthew Chance.
#CNN #News

entry.title: 'Real threats': School board president writes White House letter for protection

media:group.media:title: 'Real threats': School board president writes White House letter for protection
media:group.media:description: The National School Board Association has asked the White House and the Education Department to help protect its board members, faculty and their schools. President of the board, Viola Garcia, wrote a letter explaining the seriousness of the situation. #CNN #News

entry.title: New video reveals what Gabby Petito told police

media:group.media:title: New video reveals what Gabby Petito told police
media:group.media:description: As the Moab City Police Department released more video of Gabby Petito from an August 12 traffic stop, the FBI returned to Brian Laundrie's family home in North Port, Florida, amid the ongoing search for him. CNN's Leyla Santiago reports. #CNN #News

entry.title: Carl Bernstein: US is in a cultural civil war

media:group.media:title: Carl Bernstein: US is in a cultural civil war
media:group.media:description:
CNN's Brianna Keilar speaks to veteran journalist Carl Bernstein after Idaho election officials found nothing in their investigation into voter fraud in the state during the 2020 election.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Merck: Pill to treat Covid-19 cuts risk of death by half

media:group.media:title: Merck: Pill to treat Covid-19 cuts risk of death by half
media:group.media:description: A pill has cut the risk of hospitalization or death from Covid-19 by half in a study, Merck and Ridgeback Biotherapeutics said. It would become the first oral medicine that fights viral infection for Covid-19 if approved by the US Food and Drug Administration for emergency use authorization. CNN's John Berman and Dr. Sanjay Gupta discuss. #CNN #News

entry.title: The political roots of the anti-vax movement

media:group.media:title: The political roots of the anti-vax movement
media:group.media:description: Anti-vax resistance has been around for years. In its current form, anti-vaxxers have now seized control of the message, overshadowing Trump’s endorsements of a vaccine his administration was responsible for developing. In the latest “Reality Check with John Avlon: Extremist Beat,” Avlon traces the anti-government, anti-science and religious overtones that have persisted through the history of anti-vax opposition with CNN’s Elle Reeve and Donie O’Sullivan.

entry.title: New CCTV footage shows Sarah Everard being stopped by murderer

media:group.media:title: New CCTV footage shows Sarah Everard being stopped by murderer
media:group.media:description: British police officer Wayne Couzens has been sentenced to life in prison without parole for the abduction, rape and murder of Sarah Everard. Couzens was fired from London's Metropolitan Police in July 2021, days after he pleaded guilty to Everard's kidnap, rape and murder. CNN's Nada Bashir reports. #CNN #News
